Sample.Name: CircularGaugeSample
Sample.Title: Circular Gauge
Sample.Description: Circular Gauge control visualizes the numerical values of scales in a circular manner. In this sample, a scale with needle pointer has been used.

Sample.Name: CustomizationSample
Sample.Title: Customization
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to customize gauge elements. Here a needle and range pointer are added to show the current value and its appearance can be customized by using options in property setting

Sample.Name: DirectionCompass
Sample.Title: Direction Compass
Sample.Description: A Direction compass has been depicted by adding needles and by customizing the labels to show the direction.

Sample.Name: GradientRange
Sample.Title: Gradient Range
Sample.SearchTags: Gradient color, Smooth color, Gradient range
Sample.Description: This samples shows how to apply smooth color transition to range by specifying the different color based on range value.

Sample.Name: Pointers
Sample.Title: Pointer Customization
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to customize the pointer for scale in the circular gauge. Gauge supports different types of pointers like marker, image, needle, range pointer.

Sample.Name: MultipleScales
Sample.Title: Multiple Scales
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to render and configure multipe scales in gauge. Use scale collection to render multiple scales in gauge. Each scale can be customized with its own pointer.

Sample.Name: CircularGaugeAnnotation
Sample.Title: Annotation
Sample.Description: Annotations are used to mark the specific area of interest in gauge with texts, shapes or images. In this sample minutes and seconds sub gauges are achieved using annotation feature.
